_header: Take thou this treatise thy time therein to use
_description: Verses urging us to make the most of time — one alliterative quatrain

HunEL26C9.Transcription:
take thou this treatise thi time therin to vseto thonde thou truly
                    taste thes treasures tobteynetrifle not in traualyin thi time for to
                    abvsetake and tye but turne and try thi purpose tatteyne
